Description: Sandal for the left foot, made of plaited reed and palm leaves and papyrus, one ankle strap present, toe strap missing, pointed and curved toe, tightly woven around edge.
Curator's comments: Original photograph AN405710001 taken by Adrianus t'Hooft and copyright assigned to the Museum
Acquisition name: Donated by: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
